page.title: 08Parkend Womens Institute
page.content: Our ninteen members meet at the village hall on the second monday of every month.Talks by invited speakers have varied from wild birds, spinning ,crime prevention to flower arranging, local poetry, cooking curries, homeopathy and Christmas decorations.All speakers except two were local people.Other activites were:a walk in a local arboretum with a chief forester,folk dancing, and a visit to the house of a former member at Grosmont,which included a conducted tour of the local church and a ploughmans suppers served by the committee.Produce markets and trading stalls helped to swell funds, and a "knit in" was organised to help arthritis sufferers .Our Drama group gained two prizes at the area drama Festival : - the shield for best play and cup for best actress.
